author: hsiaowei
content:
Consensus layer specs v1.5.0-alpha.1 -- Electabuzz -- released! 

https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.5.0-alpha.1

Test vectors: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-spec-tests/releases/tag/v1.5.0-alpha.1

It is the CL spec target of `pectra-devnet-0`, with bug fixes on test cases and new fork tests. (Thank <@654267572107083777> for reporting the bugs!)

It also includes the new EIP-7549 (PeerDAS) tests (see https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/issues/3686) with **new test formats** for `general/eip7594/kzg` and `{mainnet, minimal}/eip7594/networking/get_custody_columns`.
